sentences.cn: 他今天早上觉得不舒服.

sentences.en: He had been riding in Hyde Park, but felt unwell as he was being driven back to his office late this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 他一直在海德公园骑自行车，后来感到不舒服，近黄昏时被人开车送回办公室。

sentences.en: He's unwell, he loves his country, and he's old.
sentences.cn: 他身体有病, 热爱祖国, 可是 人老了.

sentences.en: I feel pretty grotty , ie unwell.
I went to bed because I was unwell.
sentences.cn: 我因为感到不舒服,所以就上床睡觉了.

sentences.en: My friends told me that you've been unwell.
sentences.cn: 我的朋友们告诉我说你近来身体欠安.

sentences.en: On paper, I am the healthiest man alive, yet I feel permanently unwell.
sentences.cn: 理论上，我是活着的最健康的人，但是我总感觉不舒服。

sentences.en: On this occasion, in consequence of Nora being unwell, Owen and Frankie went by themselves.
sentences.cn: 这一次因为诺拉不舒服, 欧文只好带着小弗兰克去了.

sentences.en: Paul was unwell last night with a stomach upset.
She said she was feeling unwell and went home.
sentences.cn: 她说她感觉不舒服回家了。

sentences.en: She says she feels strange , ie rather unwell, perhaps dizzy.
She's been very unwell, but she's on the mend now.
sentences.cn: 她原来病得很重, 现在正在康复.

sentences.en: The picture disturbed Victor Henry because the President appeared so vulnerable, unwell, and unimportant.
sentences.cn: 这景象使维克多·亨利感到十分不安,因为总统看来是那样虚弱,那样病容满面, 那样无足轻重.

sentences.en: When we are tired, tense, depressed or unwell, we feel pain much more.
sentences.cn: 当我们劳累、紧张、沮丧或生病时，疼痛感更明显。

trans.tran_cn: 不舒服的，有病的，〈婉辞〉月经期的，不适
trans.tran_en: ill, especially for a short time
